event: Ohhhhhh
The Chen group had a happy end-of-the-year dinner in the city of Hefei!
Our review entitled "Recent Progress in High-Entropy Alloys for Catalysts: Synthesis, Applications, and Prospects"was published in Materials Today Energy. Congratulations to Ke!
Our invited review entitled "Opportunities of Aqueous Manganese-Based Batteries with Deposition and Stripping Chemistry"was published in Advanced Energy Materials. Congratulations to Mingming!
Our invited paper entitled "A high performance aqueous iron-hydrogen gas battery"was published in Materials Today Energy. Congratulations to Zhengxin!
The Chen group enjoyed a wonderful trip to Mushan Island in Chaohu Lake, Hefei!
Welcome postdocs Dr. Jifei Sun and Dr. Yan Xu to join our group!
Welcome international Master student Sunhyeong Park to join our group!
Welcome postdocs Dr. Mingyan Chuai, Dr. Yuan Yuan and Dr. Zaichun Liu to join our group!
Welcome PhD students Taoli Jiang, Xinhua Zheng and Master students Yahan Meng, Na Chen, Chunyue Shen to join our group!
Our invited paper entitled "Lithium Intercalation Compounds-Hydrogen Gas Batteries"was published in Chemical Journal of Chinese Universities. Good job, Zhengxin!
Welcome Dr. Ke Li to join our group as a postdoc!
Our first paper entitled "A High-Rate Lithium Manganese Oxide-Hydrogen Battery"was published in Nano Letters. Good job, Zhengxin!
Prof. Wei Chen attended the 1st young scholar forum hosted by Cailiaoren and gave an invited talk in Beijing.
Prof. Wei Chen attended 2019 MRS Fall meeting at Boston, Massachusetts and gave a talk on "Rechargeable Hydrogen Batteries for Grid Scale Energy Storage".
Zhengxin Zhu and Mingming Wang attended the conference of "Next-generation materials for energy applications"in Xiamen University.
Prof. Wei Chen gave an invited talk at the Shanghai Tech University.
Prof. Wei Chen gave an invited talk at the East China Normal University.
Chen Research Group website is launched!
Welcome undergraduate student Haosong Jiang to join our group!
Prof. Wei Chen attended the 5th International Conferenceon Energy Conversion and Storage at Peking University.
Prof. Wei Chen gave an invited talk at the Hunan Institute of Science and Technology on Rechargeable Hydrogen Batteries for Grid Scale Energy Storage.
Welcome Master student Mingming Wang to join our group!
Welcome PhD student Zhengxin Zhu to join our group!
Prof. Wei Chen started his research group at USTC!
